name: Room007 Ventura Hostel

reviews.text: First of all, this hostel is brand new. That means sparkling shower rooms and toilets, as well as crisp white duvets and comfortable mattresses.
reviews.title: Super comfortable, clean, new rooms

reviews.text: Location is outstanding -- pretty much right between Parque El Retiro and Sol. Perfect for seeing all the sights of Madrid in a short timeframe, but also for getting anywhere in the city, and Spain. The AVE station is also just 10 minutes walking.
reviews.title: The design of Room007 Ventura Hostel is excellent as the comfort of the rooms!

description: Urban Hostel located in Madrid Downtown. Close to Puerta del Sol, Plaza de Santa de Ana and Gran Vía. As well as the main attractions and monuments of the Madrid, such as Prado Museum.Room007 Ventura, has 21 rooms divided into double or dormitory rooms of 2, 4, 6 or 8 beds. All of them equipped with bunk beds (except doubles), bed linen, towels and Gel & Shampoo. We provide free Wi-Fi internet access, in all rooms and areas of the hostel. Guest will enjoy our Attic Lounge area, with a little kitchen, TV Set, Free Computers and Vending Machines. The hostel also provide guests with breakfast service, bar-restaurant for lunch or dining, and do not forget to visit our open-air terrace at the top floor, or the oustanding open air Patio at the Restaurant. Our nice staff will also help to find the most interesting and exciting things to do in Madrid.
